attributes.action: Collect child maintenance using HMRC 'coding out' to stop deliberate non-payment
attributes.additional_details: Current deterrents are ineffective.  Arrears written off when transferred from the CSA to CMS! Some paying parents' salaries paid to partners account so liability orders are ineffective! Some ensure no collateral in their name. Children are suffering all over the UK!  Adjusting the paying parent's tax code can stop this. This saves time, effort and stress for all concerned; not to mention tax payer's money on non-compliant and  devious 'paying' parents who actively avoid paying maintenance.
attributes.background: CHILDREN & FAMILIES ARE SUFFERING UNNECESSARILY!  Many paying parents refuse  payment, some by job-hopping, being self-employed, and manipulating the current systems.  Deductions of earnings do not work for those who choose to frequently change employers before these are effective.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "Collect child maintenance using HMRC 'coding out' to stop deliberate non-payment".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
